snippet: Nicholas Tartaglione faces a possible death sentence after being charged with murder in connection with a cocaine-distribution ring, the authorities said....
abstract: Retired Police Officer Nicholas Tartaglione is charged with four counts of murder in 'gangland-style' killings of Hector Gutierrez, Martin Luna, Miguel Luna and Urbano Santiago in Likquid Lounge bar in Chester, NY; investigators believe that Tartaglione was involved in cocaine-distribution ring.
lead_paragraph: Nicholas Tartaglione faces a possible death sentence after being charged with murder in connection with a cocaine-distribution ring, the authorities said.

headline.main: Retired Westchester Officer Charged With Killing 4 in Hudson Valley Bar
headline.print_headline: Ex-Officer in Drug Ring Killed 4, U.S. Says
